cohort.bio: My experience in the field of social science has cultivated a deep interest in understanding and using data. Taking the course on data science has enhanced my analytical skills. Now, as an aspiring data scientist, I am keen to discover and implement the best new practices to solve problems using data.

I’ve always been good with numbers, but I fell in love with science and academic research. Confronted with the reality of academia, I turned my back on academia and returned to business. Regrettably, business lacked the excitement of the scientific process. Going to my first business meetup, I found myself among data analysts and data scientists and I suddenly realized how I can combine my passion for the scientific process and my business experience. Today I want to help businesses grow by applying data science!
“Do not allow your mind to be imprisoned by majority thinking.”  - Patricia Bath
'Numbers have an important story to tell. They rely on you to give them a clear and convicing voice ' - Stephen Few
Passionate about Data Science to help business entities make right decision.
I love finding simple answers in complex places.

cohort.reelThemIn: BI Analyst and Junior Data Scientist
cohort.bio: Ex Marine and a great story teller through data

cohort.reelThemIn: Quantum Data Scientist * Vast Experience * Endless Curiosity
cohort.bio: As a retired Military Intelligence Officer, Decision Systems Consultant and emergent Data Scientist,  I help organizations harness the knowable -- that isn't yet known.

After years of training and working as a microbiologist, including a PhD from Vanderbilt University, I have learned how to approach a problem critically and develop an approach to solve it. I am excited to take these analytical and problem solving skills and apply them to data science. I love learning new methods and techniques to explore, clean, and gain insights from data in a way that brings actionable results with real value for the end client.

My experience in biomedical research, business development and clinical trials revolved around one aspect: “data” that provided knowledge. I pursued data science to learn tools to turn vast amounts of data into insights that will facilitate business decisions.
I am passionate about solving business problems using data. I enjoy analyzing and extracting information out of data.
I am passionate about building actionable data science projects.

For nearly three year, I have worked as a marketer and came to realize how data analysis can help organizations make profits with less cost. After completion of the master's degree in data analytics, I enrolled into NSS and was eager to continue to hone not only my machine learning techniques but my experience in tackling real world data questions and analysis.I keep a loss function in mind and update the weights periodically to approach the ground truth.
